identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a professional, high-contrast, intelligent interface for invoice processing that avoids generic SaaS aesthetics.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Fintech density.
Content is King: Data legibility is paramount.
Zoom In: Focus on the extracted data details.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to separate complex invoice data.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. UPDATE THEME: Replace the CSS variables in index.css with the values provided in 'colors.theme_config.light'.
3. CUSTOMIZE COMPONENTS: When using Shadcn components, override the default rounded-md with rounded-sm to match the 'Geometric/Professional' look.
4. LOGO: If the actual logo file is missing, create a typographic logo component using 'Manrope' font, Bold, Navy Blue text with a Yellow dot or accent.
5. DATA GRID: Use the 'Table' component but ensure the font is 'JetBrains Mono' for all numerical data.
6. MOBILE: Ensure the 'Verification' page stacks vertically on mobile (Image on top, Form below).
7. NOTIFICATIONS: Use 'sonner' for all success/error toasts.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
